law.catch_line: Each proposal for the lease of building space by the State shall be submitted to the Secretary....

text.section: Each proposal for the lease of building space by the State shall be submitted to the Secretary.

Unless a regulation of the Board of Public Works provides otherwise, the Secretary shall submit each proposal, along with any recommendation of the Secretary, to the Board of Public Works for final approval.

The Board of Public Works shall adopt regulations in accordance with Title 10, Subtitle 1 of the State Government Article concerning submission of proposals for the lease of building space under this section.
